languages.text: "Странно, конечно, что рвануло здесь, а не в доках. Обычно с них начинается. Там даже дрянь какую-то в воздухе распыляют, чтоб жуки-червяки мерли. Но, видать, проскочило что-то. Две семьи во-он в том дальнем блоке умерли. И Наместник сразу приказал район оцепить и не выпускать никого".

"It is a bit odd that it happened here and not at the docks, I'll grant you. Things like that usually start there. They even spray the place with some gunk to kill all the bugs an' worms. But I guess something slipped through. Two families in that block way over there snuffed it. And the Liege wasted no time getting the district surrounded so that nobody could leave."
languages.original_text: "Странно, конечно, что рвануло здесь, а не в доках. Обычно с них начинается. Там даже дрянь какую-то в воздухе распыляют, чтоб жуки-червяки мерли. Но, видать, проскочило что-то. Две семьи во-он в том дальнем блоке умерли. И Наместник сразу приказал район оцепить и не выпускать никого".

traits.locale_text: "Of course, it's a bit odd that it happened here and not at the docks. Things like that usually start there. They even spray the place with some gunk to kill all the bugs 'n worms. But I guess something slipped through. Two families in that far block over yonder keeled over. And the Liege quickly ordered to have the district surrounded so that nobody can leave."

"Of course, it's a bit odd that it happened here and not at the docks. Things like that usually start there. They even spray the place with some gunk to kill all the bugs 'n worms. But I guess something slipped through. Two families in that far block over yonder keeled over. And the Liege quickly ordered to have the district surrounded so that nobody can leave."

"It is a bit odd that it happened here and not at the docks, I'll grant you. Things like that usually start there. They even spray the place with some gunk to kill all the bugs an' worms. But I guess something slipped through. Two families in that block way over there snuffed it. And the Liege wasted no time getting the district surrounded so that nobody could leave."

"It is a bit odd that it happened here and not at the docks, I'll grant you. Things like that usually start there. They even spray the place with some gunk to kill all the bugs an' worms. But I guess something slipped through. Two families in that block way over there snuffed it. And the Liege wasted no time getting the district surrounded so that nobody could leave."

"It is a bit odd that it happened here and not at the docks, I'll grant you. Things like that usually start there. They even spray the place with some gunk to kill all the bugs an' worms. But I guess something slipped through. Two families in that block way over there snuffed it. And the Liege wasted no time getting the district surrounded so that nobody could leave."

languages.text: “但老实说，疫病不是在码头爆发，而是在这里爆发，这确实有点怪。因为像这种疫病，通常都是在码头先爆发的。那些人甚至在整片街区喷了杀虫剂，把所有虫子都杀光了，但我猜有什么东西逃掉了。那边的街区有两户人家染了病。总督没有浪费时间，立刻派人把那片街区围了起来，这样就谁都不能乱跑了。”
languages.original_text: "It is a bit odd that it happened here and not at the docks, I'll grant you. Things like that usually start there. They even spray the place with some gunk to kill all the bugs an' worms. But I guess something slipped through. Two families in that block way over there snuffed it. And the Liege wasted no time getting the district surrounded so that nobody could leave."

traits.locale_text: “但老实说，疫病不是在码头爆发，而是在这里爆发，这确实有点怪。因为像这种疫病，通常都是在码头先爆发的。那些人甚至在整片街区喷了杀虫剂，把所有虫子都杀光了，但我猜有什么东西逃掉了。那边的街区有两户人家染了病。总督没有浪费时间，立刻派人把那片街区围了起来，这样就谁都不能乱跑了。”

languages.text: «Sí admitiré que es raro que haya sucedido aquí y no en los muelles- Es donde suelen empezar este tipo de cosas. Hasta rocían el lugar con un mejunje que mata todos los bichos y gusanos. Pero supongo que algo se coló. Dos familias en el bloque que hay por ahí la diñaron. Y el Señor no perdió ni un minuto antes de ordenar que se rodeara el distrito para que nadie pudiera salir».
languages.original_text: "It is a bit odd that it happened here and not at the docks, I'll grant you. Things like that usually start there. They even spray the place with some gunk to kill all the bugs an' worms. But I guess something slipped through. Two families in that block way over there snuffed it. And the Liege wasted no time getting the district surrounded so that nobody could leave."

traits.locale_text: «Sí admitiré que es raro que haya sucedido aquí y no en los muelles- Es donde suelen empezar este tipo de cosas. Hasta rocían el lugar con un mejunje que mata todos los bichos y gusanos. Pero supongo que algo se coló. Dos familias en el bloque que hay por ahí la diñaron. Y el Señor no perdió ni un minuto antes de ordenar que se rodeara el distrito para que nadie pudiera salir».

languages.text: 「確かに、ドックじゃなくてココでこんなことになるのは変ですね。こういったことは大体ドックで起こりますから。殺虫用の液体を撒くこともあるんですよ。でも、すり抜けたヤツがいたのかもしれません。向こうのブロックの2組の家族が発症したんです。領主は即行で地区を包囲したので、誰もそこから動けないんですよ」
languages.original_text: "It is a bit odd that it happened here and not at the docks, I'll grant you. Things like that usually start there. They even spray the place with some gunk to kill all the bugs an' worms. But I guess something slipped through. Two families in that block way over there snuffed it. And the Liege wasted no time getting the district surrounded so that nobody could leave."

traits.locale_text: 「確かに、ドックじゃなくてココでこんなことになるのは変ですね。こういったことは大体ドックで起こりますから。殺虫用の液体を撒くこともあるんですよ。でも、すり抜けたヤツがいたのかもしれません。向こうのブロックの2組の家族が発症したんです。領主は即行で地区を包囲したので、誰もそこから動けないんですよ」

languages.text: "Es ist ein bisschen merkwürdig, dass es hier passiert und nicht bei den Docks, das muss ich zugeben. Normalerweise fängt so was immer dort an. Sie sprayen sogar vorsorglich irgendein Zeug, das alle Käfer und Würmer abtötet. Aber irgendwas muss wohl durchgerutscht sein. Zwei Familien in dem Block da drüben sind daran verreckt. Und der Lehnsherr hat das Viertel sofort abriegeln lassen, damit keiner rauskommt."
languages.original_text: "It is a bit odd that it happened here and not at the docks, I'll grant you. Things like that usually start there. They even spray the place with some gunk to kill all the bugs an' worms. But I guess something slipped through. Two families in that block way over there snuffed it. And the Liege wasted no time getting the district surrounded so that nobody could leave."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist ein bisschen merkwürdig, dass es hier passiert und nicht bei den Docks, das muss ich zugeben. Normalerweise fängt so was immer dort an. Sie sprayen sogar vorsorglich irgendein Zeug, das alle Käfer und Würmer abtötet. Aber irgendwas muss wohl durchgerutscht sein. Zwei Familien in dem Block da drüben sind daran verreckt. Und der Lehnsherr hat das Viertel sofort abriegeln lassen, damit keiner rauskommt."

languages.text: « C'est un peu bizarre que l'épidémie se soit déclenchée ici plutôt que sur les quais, je vous l'accorde. Généralement, c'est là-bas que ça commence. D'ailleurs, ils aspergent l'endroit avec un machin qui tue toutes les bestioles. Faut croire que quelques-unes ont réussi à passer. Deux familles du bloc tout là-bas ont crevé. Alors, le suzerain a eu vite fait de faire encercler le quartier pour que personne puisse en sortir. »
languages.original_text: "It is a bit odd that it happened here and not at the docks, I'll grant you. Things like that usually start there. They even spray the place with some gunk to kill all the bugs an' worms. But I guess something slipped through. Two families in that block way over there snuffed it. And the Liege wasted no time getting the district surrounded so that nobody could leave."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un peu bizarre que l'épidémie se soit déclenchée ici plutôt que sur les quais, je vous l'accorde. Généralement, c'est là-bas que ça commence. D'ailleurs, ils aspergent l'endroit avec un machin qui tue toutes les bestioles. Faut croire que quelques-unes ont réussi à passer. Deux familles du bloc tout là-bas ont crevé. Alors, le suzerain a eu vite fait de faire encercler le quartier pour que personne puisse en sortir. »

languages.text: "Öyleyse de rıhtım yerine burada olması biraz garip şimdi. Böyle şeyler genelde orada patlak verir. Haşereleri öldürmek için mekâna ha bire vıcık vıcık şeyler püskürtüyorlar hâlbuki. Bir şeyler aradan sıvışmış olsa gerek. Öte bloktaki iki aile mortoyu çekti. Emîr de olaya hemen el koyup kimse ayrılmasın diye semti kapattırdı."
languages.original_text: "It is a bit odd that it happened here and not at the docks, I'll grant you. Things like that usually start there. They even spray the place with some gunk to kill all the bugs an' worms. But I guess something slipped through. Two families in that block way over there snuffed it. And the Liege wasted no time getting the district surrounded so that nobody could leave."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçi rıhtımda değil de burada olması biraz garip, doğru. Böyle şeyler genelde orada patlak verir. Hatta tüm böcekleri öldürmek için mekâna vıcık vıcık şeyler de püskürtüyorlar ama herhâlde bir şeyler aradan sıvıştı. Şu bloktaki iki aile mortu çekti. Emîr de kimse ayrılmasın diye semti kuşatmak için hemen harekete geçti."
